description:
Open source machine learning and data visualization.


Enhancements
- Permutation Plot: Add widget (#6762)
- PLS: Move from Orange-spectroscopy (#6734)
- Open draged files on CSV Import, Load Model and Distance File widgets (#6747)
- Predictions: Output annotated table
- Update t-SNE widget (#6345)
- CSV Import: Skip multi rows edit (#6691)
- Remove use of pkg_resources (#6655)
- Data Info: Show statistics about missing values (#6623)
Bugfixes
- Edit Domain: Partial restore state on categories mismatch (#6776)
- Distances: Spearman actually computes Spearman instead of Pearson (#6804)
- tableview: Remove toggle selection on corner widget click (#6802)
- _simple_tree.c: Fix compilation error with gcc 14 (#6800)
- OWSom: Fix crash for data without class variable (#6763)
- io_util: Fix memory usage when parsing columns (#6757)
- pythoneditor/editor: Change order in terminate (#6756)
- Minor fixes to reenable falling CI (#6751)
- Fix failing tests on Python 3.11.8 on Windows (#6737)
- Table.add_column - Do not try to insert data in locked empty array (#6743)
- test_owcsvimport: Workaround for segfault in tests on macos (#6735)
- Domain Editor - Adapt to dark mode (#6727)
- Predictions: Output annotated table
- CSV Import: Add explicit datetime conversion (#6696)
- setup.py: Replace use of imp module (#6680)
- Writers: Store nans in StringVariable as empty strings instead of 'nan' (#6670)
- Fix impute.Model for derived domains (#6668)
- CN2 Rule Induction: Fix model's effective name (#6652)
